entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • project.assets.json contains invalid targets #22780
  • Add API for AddLogicalChild that can also be used to set the inherited binding context #22779
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • [Android] VisualDiagnostics/IWindowOverlay with Shell still has issues loading #17677
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Fix BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #19142
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Simplify and make more robust the process for Single-instance WinUI apps #9973
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    community ✨
  • [Android] TabBar navigate back on current tab #22778
    community ✨
  • Entry fields do not work correctly if bound to a numeric property from a ViewModel - fix #22777
    community ✨

Merged

  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area-controls-shell
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area-xaml, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [Housekeeping] Fix Issue22433Test #22753
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
